content:
{"name": "Meals America Montgomery County", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Meals America operates locally within Montgomery County, PA, and proudly serves all 67 Pennsylvania counties, including Philadelphia, PA. We are dedicated to providing nutritious and complimentary meals for eligible seniors on Medicare and Medicaid.
We provide Medicaid meals delivery to seniors needing long-term meal assistance, those who need short-term meal assistance while in recovery, or those who enjoy healthy free meals that require minimal preparation time.
Do you like free healthy meals delivered to your doorstep? Find out if you are eligible for the Meals America meal assistance program at NO COST.
Are you disabled?
Are you on short-term disability?
Do you have Medicare/Medicaid or ANY other health insurance that offers a paid meal option?
Are you over 60?
If you answered “yes” to any of these questions, you may qualify for Meals America’s weekly meal delivery service at NO COST!
If you have questions about eligibility, call us today at (215) 399-5676.", "email": "", "url": "https://mealsamerica.com/how-it-works", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1513 North Broad Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Lansdale", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19446", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.2545679, "longitude": -75.270219}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 399-5676", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors and people with disabilities"}]}
